channel.title: Attention! read this before playing!
channel.description:
At the request of davidi, rather than not having any server up at all, I have started the vanilla minecraft server (read: no mods) using our map.
This means no authentication, no chest protection, no anything other than plain SMP.
So you can do whatever you wish in this map (read: no rules), because it WILL be reset to the map as it was this morning, before the mods quit working. So don't spend a lot of time collecting resources or building, because it's all going to be destroyed soon. Thanks.
Also, you need the client version 1.2 to be able to play as well. I'm not going to tell you where to get this client, but perhaps google or thepiratebay.org will...

item.title: Attention! read this before playing!
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:46, topic:378245”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=474120.msg3469191#msg3469191 date=1295159095]

Yes, it will.

how am i going to play when i own an acc? im asking u since u said u own an acc 2

You can open the game normally with your internet offline and it won’t update, then when you want to connect to the server just reconnect your internet AFTER you’ve bypassed the update screen
[/quote]

When u play offline u can’t connect to servers nice try tho[/quote]
What I mean is, click on play offline then re-open your internet, it won’t update.

Read full topic
